title: Adam Varadi
text:
Adam Varadi (born 30 April 1985) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="MFK%20Fr%C3%BDdek-M%C3%ADstek">MFK Frýdek-Místek</a>.
Varadi was a member of the squad of Baník Ostrava in the <a href="Gambrinus%20liga%202003-04">2003-2004 season</a>, when Baník won the league title. He played for the Czech Republic youth national teams since the under-15 level.
